sentences.english: From the results obtained, it is evident that the crystalline lens has birefringence.
sentences.chinese: 從實驗結果得知牛眼晶狀體具有雙折射的性能。

sentences.english: The Ionization Total Dose Radiation Effects and Hardening Techniques of FPGA Microcircuit;
sentences.chinese: 目的評估長期小劑量電離輻射對晶狀體的影響。

sentences.english: Fig. 4 The intramembranous particles in fibrocell's cytomembrane reduced in cataract group.
sentences.chinese: 圖4白內障組大鼠晶狀體纖維細胞膜膜內顆粒減少。

sentences.english: Cigarette smoking can increase the risk of cataracts by putting oxidative stress on the lens of the eye.
sentences.chinese: 抽菸加重了晶狀體氧化壓力，提高了這一風險。

sentences.english: The morphology of the gap junctions in the fiber cell membranes was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 本文報道晶狀體纖維細胞間間隙連接的形態結構。

sentences.english: Perspex lenses have long since been replaced by acrylic ones.
sentences.chinese: 有機玻璃晶狀體很久以來已被丙烯酸的代替。

sentences.english: Results The visual axis were clear and IOLs in position in all operation eyes.
sentences.chinese: 結果術後全部術眼視軸透明，人工晶狀體在位。

sentences.english: These are very good for the eye lenses.
sentences.chinese: 這種物質對晶狀體非常有好處。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effect of black diaphragm intraocular lens implantation in the management of aphakia with traumatic aniridia.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討眼外傷後無虹膜無晶狀體眼的治療方法。

sentences.english: Objective To observetheeffect of high -dose irradiation on ocular lens.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察大劑量電離輻射對晶狀體的影響。

sentences.english: The cells of this epithelium exhibit many interdigitations with the lens fibers .
sentences.chinese: 這種上皮細胞同晶狀體纖維呈現許多相嵌連接。

sentences.english: Making an incision in the eye and removing the lens.
sentences.chinese: 在眼球上作一個切口然後將晶狀體摘除。

sentences.english: A cataract is a clouding or dulling of the lens in the eye.
sentences.chinese: 白內障就是眼睛的晶狀體上有陰影或者渾濁。

sentences.english: Cloudiness near the center of the lens, however, usually interferes with clear sight.
sentences.chinese: 然而如果混濁體長在晶狀體的中間，通常會影響視力。

sentences.english: Nuclear sclerosis appears as a bilateral bluish-grey haziness at the nucleus, or center of the lens.
sentences.chinese: 該疾病是晶狀體核兩側或中心部位出現灰藍色霧狀物。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the effect of long low-dose radiation on ocular lens.
sentences.chinese: 目的評估長期小劑量電離輻射對晶狀體的影響。
